aggregator_reader¶

class deepdrivemd.data.stream.aggregator_reader.ADIOS_READER(fn: str, config: pathlib.Path, stream_name: str)¶

This class is used to read the next N steps from an adios stream.

adios¶
Type

adios2.adios2.ADIOS

io¶
Type

adios2.adios2.IO

stream¶
Type

adios2.adios2.Engine

__init__(fn: str, config: pathlib.Path, stream_name: str)¶

Constructor

Parameters

  • fn (str) – file name of bp file or sst socket (without sst extension)

  • config (Path) – path to adios.xml file

  • stream_name (str) – name of a stream in adios.xml file

next_all(N: int) → Tuple[int, List[numpy.ndarray], List[numpy.ndarray], List[numpy.ndarray], List[numpy.ndarray], List[numpy.ndarray], List[numpy.ndarray]]¶

Read the next N steps of all variables.

Parameters

N (int) – read that many steps

Returns

a tuple consisting of: actual number of steps read, a list of steps, a list of md5sums, a list of contact_maps, a list of positions, a list of velocities, a list of rmsds

Return type

Tuple[int, List[np.ndarray], List[np.ndarray], List[np.ndarray], List[np.ndarray], List[np.ndarray], List[np.ndarray]]

next_cm(N: int) → Tuple[int, List[numpy.ndarray]]¶

Mini version of next_all where only contact maps are returned

Parameters

N (int) – read that many steps

Returns

a tuple of two values: how many steps were actually read, corresponding contact maps

Return type

Tuple[int, List[np.ndarray]]

class deepdrivemd.data.stream.aggregator_reader.STREAMS(file_list: List, config: str = '../aggregate/adios.xml', stream_name: str = 'AdiosOutput', lastN: int = 2000, batch: int = 10000)¶

The class keeps lastN steps from each aggregator

readers¶

a dictionary of ADIOS_READER indexed by the corresponding adios file name

Type

Dict[str, ADIOS_READER]

positions¶
Type

Dict[str, np.ndarray]

md5¶
Type

Dict[str, str]

steps¶
Type

Dict[str, np.ndarray]

rmsds¶
Type

Dict[str, np.ndarray]

cm¶
Type

Dict[str, np.ndarray]

velocities¶
Type

Dict[str, np.ndarray]

lastN¶

keep that many last steps from each aggregator

Type

int

batch¶

up to how many steps to read from each adios file at a time

Type

int

__init__(file_list: List, config: str = '../aggregate/adios.xml', stream_name: str = 'AdiosOutput', lastN: int = 2000, batch: int = 10000)¶

Constructor

Parameters

  • file_list (List[fn]) – adios files from each aggregator,

  • config (str) – adios xml file for the files,

  • stream_name (str) – corresponding stream name in adios.xml

  • lastN (int) – number of last steps to keep from each adios file

  • batch (int) – up to how many steps to read from each adios file at a time (call of next())

next() → Tuple[List[numpy.ndarray], List[numpy.ndarray], List[numpy.ndarray], List[numpy.ndarray], List[numpy.ndarray]]¶

Provide lastN steps from each aggregator

Returns

contact maps, positions, md5s, steps, velocities, rmsds

Return type

Tuple[List[np.ndarray], List[np.ndarray], List[np.ndarray], List[np.ndarray], List[np.ndarray]]

next_cm() → List[numpy.ndarray]¶

Mini version of next(): only contact maps are returned
